response.overview: Miguel Bose's album "Sereno" has been nominated at the 2002 Latin Grammies for Record of the Year and Album of the Year, and LOS VIDEOS is the perfect companion piece to the record. Featuring 17 videos in total, and 4 bonus tracks in different languages, this release is sure to delight fans, and win over some new converts.
response.tagline: This DVD features top Latin artist Bose's 17 music videos, along with 4 bonus tracks recorded in different languages.
response.title: Miguel Bosé - Los Vídeos
